ygData.subject: Re: Questions
ygData.msgSnippet: how do i get to cazic? im almost 20 and i hunt in unrest ... From: Tim Perkins  To:  Sent: Sunday, December 26, 1999
ygData.messageBody:
how do i get to cazic? im almost 20 and i hunt in unrest
----- Original Message -----
From: Tim Perkins <tperkins@...>
To: <EQ-Monks@onelist.com>
Sent: Sunday, December 26, 1999 8:50 PM
Subject: Re: [EQ-Monks] Questions


> From: "Tim Perkins" <tperkins@...>
>
> Cazic thule would be a very good place to go. you can stay there thru 35th
> if you see fit to do so, beware there are lots of trains but dont worry
just
> zone out and then back. the exp is good and the fs weapons can make you
> some cash.
>
> Kizmet Bayashi
> Monk of the 48th ..
> E-Marr
> Da`Kor
>
> ----- Original Message -----
> From: John Carney <jcarney@...>
> To: <EQ-Monks@onelist.com>
> Sent: Sunday, December 26, 1999 7:59 PM
> Subject: RE: [EQ-Monks] Questions
>
>
> > From: "John Carney" <jcarney@...>
> >
> > My advice would be Cazic Thule.
> >
> > I love that zone.
> >
> > Stone
> >
> > -----Original Message-----
> > From: Worlord [mailto:worlord99@...]
> > Sent: Sunday, December 26, 1999 5:22 PM
> > To: EQ-Monks@onelist.com
> > Subject: [EQ-Monks] Questions
> >
> >
> > From: Worlord <worlord99@...>
> >
> > Allright, I am a level 24 Monk currently hunting in
> > South Karana Aviak Tree... and sometimes the Tesh Mec
> > Gnolls. Been here for 4 levels and have had a great
> > time and enjoyed the exp. So my question is where
> > should I be hunting now? Should I stay here or move
> > on to other places? I could really use an idea.
> >
> > Thanks
> >
> >
> > =====
> > Hammeron Stonespirit
> > Monk of Quellious
> > Karana
> >
> > >
>
